translations: 妖魔化；使……成为魔鬼（demonize 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: His conclusion: "Demonizing vendors won't speed Florida's recovery."
sentences.translation: 他的结论就是：“妖魔化供应商无法加快佛罗里达的复苏进程。”

sentences.sentence: "His conclusion:" Demonizing vendors won't speed Florida's recovery.
sentences.translation: 他的结论就是：“妖魔化供应商无法加快佛罗里达的复苏进程。”

sentences.sentence: He says both sides must improve textbooks to make sure there are no factual errors or demonizing of the other.
sentences.translation: 他说，双方都需要改进教科书，确保书中不包括不符合事实的错误，和妖魔化对方的内容。
